thread.title: N & J
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by N & J

author: N & J
title: N & J
text: WE BOOKED OUR REDSPOT CAR RENTAL THROUGH A BOOKING AGENT, THE CONFIRMATION FROM REDSPOT WAS INSTANT, ON COLLECTION THE REDSPOT MEMBER OF STAFF HAD ALL OUR PAPERWORK READY, QUICK CHECK AND SIGNING, NO HARD SELL FOR EXTRAS AND POINTED US IN DIRECTION OF THE CAR, ALL VERY QUICK AND EFFICIENT. THE CAR WAS CLEAN, VERY TIDY AND EXACTLY WHAT THEY ADVERTISED. RETURNED THE CAR THREE WEEKS LATER FULL OF FUEL, PARKED, HANDED THE KEY IN, AGAIN ALL VERY QUICK AND EFFICIENT. WE WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND AND USE THEM AGAIN
